features: MOVE FILES IN A FLASH: Fast and convenient read speeds up to 300 MB/s* with the latest USB 3.1 standard give you more time to work, play, watch, and create; Send a 3GB 4K UHD video file from your Bar Plus to your PC in just 10 seconds**

RUGGED REFINEMENT: As strong as it is stylish; The sturdy metal body keeps your data safe and intact, and the integrated keyring prevents accidental misplacement or loss; The Bar Plus is the ideal combination of stunning design and worry-free durability

TOUGH & TRUSTED: The Bar Plus a trustworthy drive to store your valuable data; It works through it all with a waterproof, shock-proof, temperature-proof, magnet-proof, and X-ray-proof body, all backed by a 5-year limited warranty***

WORLD'S #1 FLASH MEMORY BRAND: Experience the performance and reliability from the world's #1 brand for flash memory since 2003;**** All firmware & components, including Samsung's world-renowned DRAM & NAND, are produced in-house
body.description: A modern take on a classic. The next generation Bar Plus elevates the flash drive to an everyday essential, offering impressive speed and striking design. Fit to your hand, the metal unibody is pure minimalism in a drive that cleverly blends style, speed, and reliability. *Up to 300 MB/s for 256/128GB models; up to 200 MB/s for 64/32GB models. **Minimum of 10 secs for 256/128GB models; minimum of 14 secs for 64/32GB models (tested with combination of Asus Z370-G, Intel i7-8700K@3.70GHz, 8GB DDR4 and Windows 10 Enterprise 64bit). ***Up to 72 hrs in seawater. Up to 1,500 gravitational acceleration. Withstands -25°C to 85°C operating, -40°C to 85°C non-operating. Up to 15,000 gauss (equal to MRI). Up to 50 Roentgen (equal to airport X-ray machines). Samsung is not liable for any damages and/or loss of data or expenses incurred due to UFD data recovery. For specific details on warranty, please visit: www.samsung.com/support. ****Source: 2003-2019 IHS Markit data: NAND suppliers' revenue market share.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Speed in Style Samsung USB 3.1 Flash Drive BAR Plus 128GB A modern take on a classic. The next generation Bar Plus elevates the flash drive to an everyday essential, offering impressive speeds in a striking design. Fits in your hand, a pure minimalism that cleverly blends style, speed, and reliability. At a Glance: Innovative V-NAND Technology with Enhanced Read/Write PerformanceSuperior Endurance

Move Files in a Flash Get your time back. Fast and convenient read speeds up to 400 MB/s¹ with the latest USB 3.1 standard gives you more time to work, play, watch, and create. Send a 3GB 4K UHD video file from your Bar Plus to your PC in just 10 seconds².

Rugged Refinement As rugged as it is stylish. The sturdy metal body keeps your data safe and intact, and the integrated key ring prevents accidental misplacement or loss. The Bar Plus is the ideal combination of stunning design and durability.

Tough & Trusted Files stay secure, anywhere you go. Samsung's leadership in flash memory makes the Bar Plus a trustworthy drive to store your valuable data. It works through it all with a waterproof, shock-proof³, temperature-proof⁴, magnet-proof, and X-ray-proof⁵ body. Note: Samsung is not liable for any damages and/or loss of data or expenses incurred due to UFD data recovery.

Disclaimers ¹Up to 400MB/s for 256/128GB models; Up to 300MB/s for 64GB model and up to 200MB/s for 32GB model. ²Minimum of 10 secs for 256/128GB models; Minimum of 14 secs for 64/32GB models. ³Waterproof up to 72 hrs in seawater and shock-proof up to 1,500 gravitational acceleration. ⁴Withstands -25°C to 85°C operating, -40°C to 85°C non-operating. ⁵Magnet-proof up to 15,000 gauss and X-ray proof up to 50 Roentgen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It marries style with substance, providing a reliable, high-performance
reviews.reviewText: Title: "Elegance Meets Exceptional Performance: A 5-Star Marvel in Samsung's BAR Plus 64GB USB Flash Drive!"⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐I recently acquired the Samsung BAR Plus 64GB USB 3.1 Flash Drive in the stunning Champagne Silver variant, and I must say, it has exceeded all my expectations in both style and substance. This little marvel is a true testament to Samsung's commitment to quality and innovation.Let's start with the design – the Champagne Silver finish is nothing short of breathtaking. The sleek metal casing not only exudes a premium feel but also provides durability that ensures this flash drive can handle the rigors of everyday use with elegance. It's a tech accessory that complements my style, and I find myself reaching for it with a sense of pride.Now, onto the performance – and oh, what performance it delivers! The USB 3.1 interface ensures blazing-fast data transfer speeds of up to 300MB/s, making file transfers a breeze. Whether I'm moving large multimedia files or important documents, the BAR Plus handles it all seamlessly. It has become an indispensable tool for my on-the-go lifestyle, saving me precious time whenever I need to share or access data.The thoughtful engineering of the retractable USB connector is another standout feature. No more worrying about losing a cap or fumbling with extra parts – a simple push and the connector slides out smoothly, ready to plug into any device. This design not only adds to the overall convenience but also protects the connector from potential damage.Moreover, the 64GB capacity strikes a perfect balance for my needs. It's spacious enough to accommodate a plethora of files, yet compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry in my pocket or attach to my keychain. It has become my go-to solution for transferring files between devices without the hassle of cloud storage.Samsung has also gone the extra mile in terms of compatibility, ensuring that the BAR Plus works seamlessly across a variety of devices, from laptops to smart TVs and beyond. It's reassuring to know that regardless of the gadget, my data is accessible and transferable with this versatile flash drive.In conclusion, the Samsung BAR Plus 64GB USB 3.1 Flash Drive in Champagne Silver has truly impressed me on all fronts. It marries style with substance, providing a reliable, high-performance solution for anyone in need of a quality USB flash drive. If you're looking for a blend of elegance, durability, and exceptional speed, look no further – the BAR Plus is a shining star in the world of USB storage. Highly recommended! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Samsung Makes high-quality flash drives and This One Is Rugged & Fast
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the SAMSUNG 3.1 USB Flash Drive, and it has proven to be a reliable and convenient storage solution. The fast read speeds of up to 300 MB/s, thanks to the latest USB 3.1 standard, make transferring data quick and a breeze.One standout feature is the sturdy metal body of the flash drive. This not only adds a level of durability but also provides assurance that my data is safe and secure. The rugged metal casing can withstand the daily wear and tear of being carried around.Additionally, the integrated keyring is a smart addition, allowing me to keep the flash drive easily accessible and preventing the risk of misplacement. It's a small detail, but it adds a level of practicality that I appreciate.In conclusion, the SAMSUNG 3.1 USB Flash Drive has lived up to my expectations, offering fast and reliable performance in a durable and well-designed package. If you're in need of a high-quality flash drive with ample storage, this is a solid choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast for the price, great form factor for key ring, consistent performance across multiple units, stylish - see DiskMark results
reviews.reviewText: Bought three of these Samsung BAR plus in 64GB, two for key chain use, one to have handy on my desk. Made sure Amazon was the seller to help avoid any risk of non-genuine Samsung parts. Just arrived and burned each one in briefly using CrystalDiskMark, so I could both be sure each worked and compare speeds between the units. All three tested within about 2% of each other on each benchmark. Importantly, the sequential read speeds exceeded the claimed 200 MB/s in each case, averaging 224 MB/s. Writes were all 34MB/s. All tests were conducted on my laptop, a Lenovo Flex5, on a USB 3.0 port. Clearly the sequential read speeds take advantage of USB3.0 bandwidth.Overall very pleased for the price and the key chain friendly stainless steel casing. Note I did put a cover on the USB end of each, using the covers from Honbay 40pcs Semitransparent Black and Clear Plastic USB Male Anti-Dust Plug Stopper Cap Cover . I wanted just a bit more protection when used on key chains from dents and the elements. These Honbay covers fit snugly yet come off relatively easily. These feel like TPR, which is good for grip and flexibility.Pros+Fairly fast overall for the price, and clearly very fast at sequential reads.+Good looking, tough stainless steel body+Great form factor for handling - only as wide as a USB port so they won't cause any interference with adjacent ports, a bit longer than the really small USB drives designed to stay mounted all the time, but therefore very easy to get in and out, especially with the raised end near the lanyard hole providing a nice grip.+Hangs just fine on my key chain, a Maxpedition Gear Keyper Maxpedition Gear Keyper, Foliage Green using a FREEkey ring, the absolutely most secure rings you can buy in my experience FREEkey Accessory Ring Spares, 10 Count Cons-wish for faster write speeds-gets warm but not so hot as to be a concern so farNo data yet on reliability, will updated if I find any issues.CrystalDiskMark results, below...-----------------------------------------------------------------------CrystalDiskMark 6.0.0 x64 (C) 2007-2017 hiyohiyo Crystal Dew World : https://crystalmark.info/-----------------------------------------------------------------------* MB/s = 1,000,000 bytes/s [SATA/600 = 600,000,000 bytes/s]* KB = 1000 bytes, KiB = 1024 bytes Sequential Read (Q= 32,T= 1) : 224.198 MB/s Sequential Write (Q= 32,T= 1) : 34.365 MB/s Random Read 4KiB (Q= 8,T= 8) : 13.355 MB/s [ 3260.5 IOPS] Random Write 4KiB (Q= 8,T= 8) : 13.147 MB/s [ 3209.7 IOPS] Random Read 4KiB (Q= 32,T= 1) : 13.285 MB/s [ 3243.4 IOPS] Random Write 4KiB (Q= 32,T= 1) : 13.377 MB/s [ 3265.9 IOPS] Random Read 4KiB (Q= 1,T= 1) : 12.632 MB/s [ 3084.0 IOPS] Random Write 4KiB (Q= 1,T= 1) : 12.593 MB/s [ 3074.5 IOPS] Test : 1024 MiB [E: 0.0% (0.0/59.8 GiB)] (x5) [Interval=5 sec] Date : 2018/07/03 4:03:29 OS : Windows 10 Professional [10.0 Build 17134] (x64)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decorative and Reliable
reviews.reviewText: We use these to send wedding photos to our photography clients. It is a sleek, elegant looking USB that has plenty of room. It is also fast and reliable, while being priced well for business use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid, hefty drive. Works crazy fast in short bursts.
reviews.reviewText: 256GB in such a compact space is wonderful. And the drive is really solid and heavy. I bought it to pull files off my old laptop and install on my new one. At the start of retrieving the files, it went really fast. But after a few files, the speed dropped tremendously. So I'm mired down for a while bringing the files over (see the file-copy image attached). I have confirmed that external hard drives do not perform in this manner, so it appears to be the behavior of this thumb drive. Perhaps it utilizes a read cache for short bursts, and it doesn't last through 79GB of data.
La transferencia de datos es veloz y su construcción se siente de calidad

This Samsung 64GB USB drive is a standout for its exceptional speed and compact size. With a blazing transfer rate of 300mb/s, it moves large files in a flash, making it ideal for everyone from professionals to casual users. Its 64GB capacity is ample for storing a variety of files, from videos to large data sets. The drive's small, sleek design makes it incredibly portable, fitting easily into pockets or bags. It's also sturdy and reliable, ensuring your data is safe from physical damage. User-friendly, it works right out of the box without needing extra software or setup. This USB drive is a great choice for anyone needing fast, efficient, and secure data storage in a compact form. I definitely recommend it

Hatte vor diesem die 128GB Version in dunkel grau, dort nutzt sich aber der Lack relativ schnell ab. Diese Version in Champagner-Silber scheint anodisiert zu sein und so wie es derzeit bei mir aussieht, länger haltbar.Versprochene Geschwindigkeit wird weitesgegehend eingehalten und ich bin allgemein zufrieden auch mit diesem USB-Stick.
Ventoy bootable program runs in a second.Reading speed 300 mb writing speed 30-35mb stable. no fluctuations.With out any doubt just go for it.
